data.title: Who has Matt LeBlanc dated? Past girlfriends and relationship history
data.meta_description: THE Friends reunion is premiering today and fans are excited to catch up with their favourite sitcom stars.Cast member Matt LeBlanc is best known for
data.text:
THE Friends reunion is premiering today and fans are excited to catch up with their favourite sitcom stars.

Cast member Matt LeBlanc is best known for playing ladies-man Joey in the hit show- but who is the star dating in real life?

ðŸ”µ Read our Friends reunion live blog for the latest updates...

Who is Matt LeBlanc dating now?

The 53-year-old is currently dating Aurora Mulligan, 36, a TV producer 17 years his junior.

Mulligan, 36, who hails from Northern Ireland, was educated at Liverpool University with a degree in politics, political science, and government before opting for a career in television.

The producer landed a job at BBC in 2015, with her IMDb profile, crediting her for working on several TV shows, including, Top Gear, where she met the Friends star.

The pair were spotted cosying up at the Hickstead Derby in 2017, with an insider reporting to The Sun: "They were very tactile, and Matt seemed to be very taken by Aurora as he laughed chatted intimately with her.

"Aurora just kept laughing at all his jokes and is clearly besotted with the American superstar."

The couple first stepped out publicly at the Tribeca Film Festival.

Who has Matt LeBlanc dated?

LeBlanc has been married as well as several high-profile relationships before settling down with Aurora in 2017.

Melissa McKnight

The actor was married to Melissa McKnight, tying the knot with the actress in 2003, before the pair went their separate ways in 2006.

The pair had a daughter, named Marina Pearl, in 2005.

Matt and Melissa - known as Missy - share joint custody of Marina.

Teri Copley

LeBlanc dated actress and playboy cover model, Teri Copley, from August 1989 to 1990.

In 2018 Copley appeared on the Dr Phil television series seeking help for her adult daughter Ashley, whose boyfriend Hector was accused by Copley of being physically abusive

Kate Hudson

In 1996, Matt LeBlanc and Golden Globe winner, Kate Hudson, were rumoured to be dating, while she was only 17 at the time.

The two were snapped snogging in a scandalous article.

Hudson is the daughter of actress Goldie Hawn and is set to star in the sequel to Rian Johnson's popular murder mystery, Knives Out.

Andrea Anders

Matt dated his Joey co-star Andrea Anders dated from 2006 to January 2015.

The 46-year-old, originally from Wisconsin, starred as Alex in the spin-off show about the loveable Friends lothario.

After their eight year long relationship ended, Anders went on to star in Modern Family and About A Boy.

Holly Magrath

In May 2010, Matt was rumoured to be hooking up with British actress Holly Magrath, who he met on the set of Episodes.

Magrath, who was working as an extra at the time, reported that LeBlanc confessed he had a girlfriend (Andrea Anders) but told her it was "on-off".

The Friends reunion special will air in the UK and Ireland on Sky ONE on Thursday 27, 2021 at 8pm.
